verses.verse: וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no יָכֹ֨ל <S%H3201><s%> ya-Chol could יוֹסֵ֜ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef Then Joseph לְהִתְאַפֵּ֗ק <S%H662><s%> le-hit-'ap-Pek, not refrain לְכֹ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol all הַנִּצָּבִים֙ <S%H5324><s%> han-nitz-tza-Vim himself before all them that stood עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav, and he וַיִּקְרָ֕א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra by him and he cried הוֹצִ֥יאוּ <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi-'u to go out כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol have everyone אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man מֵעָלָ֑י <S%H5921><s%> me-'a-Lai; out וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- no עָ֤מַד <S%H5975><s%> 'A-mad from me And there stood אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> 'ish no man אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> it-To, for בְּהִתְוַדַּ֥ע <S%H3045><s%> be-hit-vad-Da' made himself known יוֹסֵ֖ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef with him while Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אֶחָֽיו׃ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav. unto his brethren

וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten aloud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lo loudly בִּבְכִ֑י <S%H1065><s%> biv-Chi; overflowing וַיִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-me-'U heard מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4713><s%> mitz-Ra-yim, Egyptian וַיִּשְׁמַ֖ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' heard בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and the house פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh. of Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יוֹסֵ֤ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav unto his brethren אֲנִ֣י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I am יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, I [am] Joseph הַע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> ha-'od still אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi doth my father חָ֑י <S%H2416><s%> Chai; age וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- not יָכְל֤וּ <S%H3201><s%> ya-che-Lu could אֶחָיו֙ <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav to his brothers לַעֲנ֣וֹת <S%H6030><s%> la-'a-Not not answer אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for נִבְהֲל֖וּ <S%H926><s%> niv-ha-Lu him for they were troubled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nav. at his presence

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said יוֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef And Joseph אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to his אֶחָ֛יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav unto his brethren גְּשׁוּ־ <S%H5066><s%> ge-shu- Come near נָ֥א <S%H4994><s%> na Please אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about וַיִּגָּ֑שׁוּ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-Ga-shu; to me I pray you And they came near וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said אֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I יוֹסֵ֣ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef I [am] Joseph אֲחִיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> 'a-chi-Chem, your brother אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> me-char-Tem whom ye sold אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti מִצְרָֽיְמָה׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-ye-mah. into Egypt

וְעַתָּ֣ה׀ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תֵּעָ֣צְב֗וּ <S%H6087><s%> te-'A-tze-Vu, Now therefore be not grieved וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not יִ֙חַר֙ <S%H2734><s%> yi-char nor angry בְּעֵ֣ינֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5869><s%> be-'Ei-nei-Chem, with yourselves כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4376><s%> me-char-Tem that ye sold אֹתִ֖י <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti הֵ֑נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah; here כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לְמִֽחְיָ֔ה <S%H4241><s%> le-mich-Yah, to preserve life שְׁלָחַ֥נִי <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cha-ni did send אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him me hither for God לִפְנֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem. me before you

כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh these שְׁנָתַ֥יִם <S%H8141><s%> she-na-Ta-yim For these two years הָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> ha-ra-'Av [hath] the famine בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> be-Ke-rev [been] in הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; the land וְעוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> ve-'Od are still חָמֵ֣שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh and yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> 'ein- in the which [there shall] neither חָרִ֖ישׁ <S%H2758><s%> cha-Rish [be] earing וְקָצִּֽיר׃ <S%H7105><s%> ve-katz-Tzir nor harvest

וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֤נִי <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-la-Che-ni sent אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him And God לִפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Chem, me before you לָשׂ֥וּם <S%H7760><s%> la-Sum to preserve לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem שְׁאֵרִ֖ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit you a posterity בָּאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz; in the earth וּלְהַחֲי֣וֹת <S%H2421><s%> u-le-ha-cha-Yot and to save your lives לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, לִפְלֵיטָ֖ה <S%H6413><s%> lif-lei-Tah deliverance גְּדֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah. by a great

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah, Now לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not אַתֶּ֞ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem who שְׁלַחְתֶּ֤ם <S%H7971><s%> she-lach-Tem So now [it was] not you [that] sent אֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Ti הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah, here כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> ki but הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; me hither but God וַיְשִׂימֵ֨נִֽי <S%H7760><s%> vay-si-Me-ni and he hath made לְאָ֜ב <S%H1><s%> le-'Av me a father לְפַרְעֹ֗ה <S%H6547><s%> le-far-'Oh, to Pharaoh וּלְאָדוֹן֙ <S%H113><s%> u-le-'a-dOn and lord לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of all בֵּית֔וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To, of all his house וּמֹשֵׁ֖ל <S%H4910><s%> u-mo-Shel and a ruler בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

מַהֲרוּ֮ <S%H4116><s%> ma-ha-Ru Haste וַעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> va-'a-Lu ye and go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אָבִי֒ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi to my father וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֣ם <S%H559><s%> va-'a-mar-Tem and say אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַר֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar unto him Thus saith בִּנְךָ֣ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha thy son יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, Joseph שָׂמַ֧נִי <S%H7760><s%> sa-Ma-ni hath made אֱלֹהִ֛ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God לְאָד֖וֹן <S%H113><s%> le-'a-Don me lord לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol of all מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim; of all Egypt רְדָ֥ה <S%H3381><s%> re-Dah come down אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai about אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּעֲמֹֽד׃ <S%H5975><s%> ta-'a-Mod. unto me tarry

וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֣ <S%H3427><s%> ve-ya-shav-Ta And thou shalt dwell בְאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> ve-'e-retz- in the land גֹּ֗שֶׁן <S%H1657><s%> Go-shen, of Goshen וְהָיִ֤יתָ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yi-ta become קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> ka-rOv and thou shalt be near אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, about אַתָּ֕ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> u-va-Nei-cha unto me thou and thy children וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and thy children's בָנֶ֑יךָ <S%H1121><s%> va-Nei-cha; children וְצֹאנְךָ֥ <S%H6629><s%> ve-tzo-ne-Cha and thy flocks וּבְקָרְךָ֖ <S%H1241><s%> u-ve-ka-re-Cha and thy herds וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְכִלְכַּלְתִּ֤י <S%H3557><s%> ve-chil-kal-Ti And there will I nourish אֹֽתְךָ֙ <S%H853><s%> 'o-te-Cha שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> Sham, There כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- there ע֛וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od are still חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> cha-Mesh thee for yet [there are] five שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim years רָעָ֑ב <S%H7458><s%> ra-'Av; of famine פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> pen- come תִּוָּרֵ֛שׁ <S%H3423><s%> tiv-va-Resh and all that thou hast come to poverty אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וּבֵֽיתְךָ֖ <S%H1004><s%> u-vei-te-Cha lest thou and thy household וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

וְהִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh Behold עֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-nei-Chem And behold your eyes רֹא֔וֹת <S%H7200><s%> ro-'ot, see וְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nei and the eyes אָחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi of my brother בִנְיָמִ֑ין <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-Min; Benjamin כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that it פִ֖י <S%H6310><s%> fi that [it is] my mouth הַֽמְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> ham-dab-Ber that speaketh אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Chem. about

וְהִגַּדְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5046><s%> ve-hig-gad-Tem And ye shall tell לְאָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vi, my father אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all כְּבוֹדִי֙ <S%H3519><s%> ke-vo-Di of all my glory בְּמִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> be-mitz-Ra-yim, in Egypt וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you רְאִיתֶ֑ם <S%H7200><s%> re-'i-Tem; and of all that ye have seen וּמִֽהַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H4116><s%> u-mi-har-Tem and ye shall haste וְהוֹרַדְתֶּ֥ם <S%H3381><s%> ve-ho-rad-Tem and bring down אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi my father הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah. here

וַיִּפֹּ֛ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol And he fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and צַוְּארֵ֥י <S%H6677><s%> tzav-ve-Rei neck בִנְיָמִֽן־ <S%H1144><s%> vin-ya-min- Benjamin's אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv upon his brother וַיֵּ֑בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-Ye-vek; and wept וּבִנְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> u-vin-ya-Min, and Benjamin בָּכָ֖ה <S%H1058><s%> ba-Chah wept עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on צַוָּארָֽיו׃ <S%H6677><s%> tzav-va-Rav. upon his neck

וַיְנַשֵּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> vay-nash-Shek Moreover he kissed לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav all his brethren וַיֵּ֣בְךְּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-Ye-vek and wept עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem; upon וְאַ֣חֲרֵי <S%H310><s%> ve-'A-cha-rei upon them and after כֵ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> Chen, after that דִּבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> dib-be-Ru talked אֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'e-Chav that his brethren אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> it-To. now when

וְהַקֹּ֣ל <S%H6963><s%> ve-hak-Kol And the fame נִשְׁמַ֗ע <S%H8085><s%> nish-Ma', thereof was heard בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh in Pharaoh's לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying בָּ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Ba-'u are come אֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei brethren יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef; Joseph's וַיִּיטַב֙ <S%H3190><s%> vai-yi-Tav be accepted בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei and פַרְעֹ֔ה <S%H6547><s%> far-'Oh, Pharaoh וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> u-ve-'ei-Nei affliction עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dav. his servants

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said פַּרְעֹה֙ <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh And Pharaoh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, unto Joseph אֱמֹ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'e-Mor Say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אַחֶ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chei-cha unto thy brethren זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise עֲשׂ֑וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su; This do טַֽעֲנוּ֙ <S%H2943><s%> ta-'a-Nu ye lade אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּעִ֣ירְכֶ֔ם <S%H1165><s%> be-'I-re-Chem, your beasts וּלְכוּ־ <S%H1980><s%> u-le-chu- along בֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Vo-'u get אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah you unto the land כְּנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> ke-Na-'an. of Canaan
